医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
利用可持续纳米材料和生物传感器感知更健康的未来在圣地亚哥 2024 年 Pittcon 大会上进行的采访中，我们采访了今年的主讲人 Omowunmi (Wunmi) Sadik 教授，探讨了可持续纳米材料如何改变人类健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Sensing-a-Healthier-Future-with-Sustainable-Nanomaterials-and-Biosensors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Sensing-a-Healthier-Future-with-Sustainable-Nanomaterials-and-Biosensors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=182bc5e7-bd0b-4538-8ade-ad567ecd7eb9 Thu, 16 May 2024 11:59:00 -0400 Sensing a Healthier Future with Sustainable Nanomaterials and Biosensors
临床试验表明高血压自我管理策略可能有效控制血压研究结果表明，与常规护理相比，高血压的自我管理策略可以在 24 个月内有效降低血压水平，而不会增加医疗资源利用率或不良事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Clinical-trial-suggests-hypertension-self-management-strategies-may-be- effective-to-control-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Clinical-trial-suggests-hypertension-self-management-strategies-may-be- effective-to-control-blood-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b02d0680-d50e-4c17-abdb-fd3a1f387009 Thu, 16 May 2024 11:10:00 -0400 Clinical trial suggests hypertension self-management strategies may be effective to control blood pressure
歧视会对身体造成伤害吗？研究人员调查遭受歧视是否与加速衰老的生物过程有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Does-discrimination-cause-harm-to-the-body.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Does-discrimination-cause-harm-to-the-body.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=187f3c7a-eb97-44a8-aca1-f6f3bad3993d Thu, 16 May 2024 10:49:00 -0400 Does discrimination cause harm to the body?
接种疫苗的女性宫颈癌发病率显着下降HPV 疫苗接种计划在降低宫颈癌患病率方面的效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Cervical-cancer-rates-drop-significantly-among-vaccinated-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Cervical-cancer-rates-drop-significantly-among-vaccinated-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7bbe4ab4-c30a-4c1f-b4c9-35b889f20baf Thu, 16 May 2024 08:24:00 -0400 Cervical cancer rates drop significantly among vaccinated women
Closed Loop Medicine 和 Pharmanovia 开始针对其首个精准医学联合疗法的 OptiZest 研究Closed Loop Medicine Ltd 是一家领先的 TechBio 公司，开发组合处方药加软件治疗产品，提供个性化剂量优化，而 Pharmanovia 是一家将新药商业化并振兴、延长和扩大现有药物生命周期的全球制药公司，今天宣布启动他们的 OptiZest 研究（ID：NCT06372470）和首次患者招募。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Closed-Loop-Medicine-and-Pharmanovia-commence-OptiZest-study-for-their-first- precision-medicine-combination-therapeutic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Closed-Loop-Medicine-and-Pharmanovia-commence-OptiZest-study-for-their-first- precision-medicine-combination-therapeutic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b86ef38-2b2f-4514-bf89-9f1689169ee1 Thu, 16 May 2024 08:09:00 -0400 Closed Loop Medicine and Pharmanovia commence OptiZest study for their first precision medicine combination therapeutic
Azenta 在英国牛津开设新基因组实验室Azenta, Inc. 今天宣布在英国牛津开设新的基因组学实验室，进一步扩大 GENEWIZ Multiomics & Synthesis Solutions 在英国市场的全球影响力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Azenta-opens-the-doors-to-its-new-genomics-laboratory-in-Oxford-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Azenta-opens-the-doors-to-its-new-genomics-laboratory-in-Oxford-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65196347-1ec2-4b66-8477-3cc7ace1d86d Thu, 16 May 2024 07:58:00 -0400 Azenta opens the doors to its new genomics laboratory in Oxford, UK
肠道微生物群和肥胖：新研究显示益生菌和益生元干预取得了有希望的结果低热量、充足纤维的养生法结合益生菌补充剂和体力活动对健康、身体成分和体质的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Gut-microbiota-and-obesity-New-study-shows-promising-results-with-probiotic-and-prebiotic-intervention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Gut-microbiota-and-obesity-New-study-shows-promising-results-with-probiotic-and-prebiotic-intervention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6d7a35f-69f6-4afc-8269-1bf9adc73bc7 Thu, 16 May 2024 07:51:00 -0400 Gut microbiota and obesity: New study shows promising results with probiotic and prebiotic intervention
Rapid Novor 与 PMCC 合作评估 EasyM™ 用于多发性骨髓瘤微小残留病监测基于质谱 (MS) 的抗体蛋白测序领域的全球领导者 Rapid Novor Inc. 今天宣布，第一位患者已入组一项名为“EasyM™ 用于新诊断 MM 患者疾病反应分析的临床评估”的新临床研究（NDMM）'。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Rapid-Novor-teams-up-with-PMCC-to-evaluate-EasyMe284a2-for-multiple-myeloma-minimal-residual-disease-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Rapid-Novor-teams-up-with-PMCC-to-evaluate-EasyMe284a2-for-multiple-myeloma-minimal-residual-disease-monitoring.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a560f74-5004-4560-ae5e-fbd8cef75d67 Thu, 16 May 2024 07:47:00 -0400 Rapid Novor teams up with PMCC to evaluate EasyM™ for multiple myeloma minimal residual disease monitoring
加州大学洛杉矶分校抗议的医务人员称警察武器流血并导致骨头破裂在加州大学洛杉矶分校的抗议者营地内，在悬挂的手电筒的光芒和震耳欲聋的闪光弹爆炸背景下，妇产科住院医师陈伊莲突然感觉自己像一名战地医务人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Medics-at-UCLA-protest-say-police-weapons-drew-blood-and-cracked-bones.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Medics-at-UCLA-protest-say-police-weapons-drew-blood-and-cracked-bones.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2368bfd2-f876-4df0-b9c4-048db8f548f5 Thu, 16 May 2024 06:41:14 -0400 Medics at UCLA protest say police weapons drew blood and cracked bones
加州 120 亿美元的医疗补助改造银行依靠非营利组织的支持在豪尔赫·桑切斯年轻时的大部分时间里，他经常喘气，有时咳嗽得很厉害，几乎要吐了。深夜，他的母亲把他送到急诊室并和他一起睡，以确保他没有停止呼吸。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Californiae28099S-2412-billion-Medicaid-makeover-banks-on-nonprofitse28099-buy-in.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Californiae28099S-2412-billion-Medicaid-makeover-banks-on-nonprofitse28099-buy-in.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a0beb51-2a1f-48e1-af98-0c888ea51a99 Thu, 16 May 2024 06:37:58 -0400 California’S $12 billion Medicaid makeover banks on nonprofits’ buy-in
